thread.title: Outfit of the Week: A Cozy Sweater and Skirt
thread.title_full: Outfit of the Week: A Cozy Sweater and Skirt -- The Cut

author: Diana Tsui
title: Outfit of the Week: A Cozy Sweater and Skirt
text:
Photo: Jody Rogac
There's that point during the week (usually Wednesday or Thursday) when you absolutely cannot get out of bed. You hit snooze until the last possible minute and jolt awake in a panic. Your hair is greasy and you have zero time to figure out what to wear, much less take a shower. For those moments, this is the outfit you can throw on and head out the door without feeling like a complete mess.
Begin with a cozy turtleneck in a rich color like this burgundy Nili Lotan one that feels as soft as Drake . Should you want a similar look at a much lower price point, Zara has an equally nubby option . Pair with a skirt that hits you at the hips and ankle boots (plus tights, when it's cold enough) and you're good to go. And that greasy hair? Sweep it up and use a sleek hairpin.
Photo: Jody Rogac Photo: Jody Rogac
Nili Lotan half cardigan stitch turtleneck, $995 at Nili Lotan ; M.M. La Fleur Chelsea skirt, $210 at M.M. La Fleur ; & Other Stories suede reptile embossed boots, $275 at & Other Stories ; Sylvain Le Hen hairpin, $70 at La Garçonne .
Photographer: Jody Rogac; styling by Diana Tsui; model: Melanie Culley at DNA Models; makeup by Allie Smith; hair by Takashi Ashizawa using Oribe Hair Care; photo editor: Emily Shornick; photo assistant: Tim Schutsky.
